price: 言え。「本当に私の礼拝も犠牲も、生も死も、全創造物の主*アッラー*のためのみ。
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحۡيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qul inna ṣalātī wanusukī wamaḥyāya wamamātī lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
